name: Saving Natasha
description:
In Saving Natasha, you seek to walk your friend safely from school. Unfortunately, several people lurking just out of sight have other things in mind.

Saving Natasha is an assignment based project under the Sidewalk Smart campaign that aims to teach  safety & awareness on kidnapping to 7-14 year old children in Malaysia.

This short visual novel game is an interactive approach to test Malaysian youth on whether they know the right choices to make when approached by adults.
